title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: The first Combo does not take focus when clicked on. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Find the first Combo. 3. Click on the first Combo. Note that it does not take focus.
